name: I wanna build a robot (itch)
description:
I wanna build a robot is our attempt to the april 2020 Scream Machine game jam.
It is a top-view action game where you have to find parts to build a robot. Or is it ?

Controls : press arrows to move, spacebar to hit with the stick, C to throw a stone.

Have fun and let us know what you thought about it !
